org.simulationsystems.csf.sim.adapters.simengines.repastS.api

Class RepastS_SimulationRunContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simulationsystems.csf.sim.adapters.simengines.repastS.api.RepastS_SimulationRunContext

  • public class RepastS_SimulationRunContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the context for the Common Simulation Framework. This Simulation-Toolkit-specific context mirrors the generic DistSysRunContext provided by the Common Framework API. It enables API users to get native Simulation-Toolkit objects instead of generic "Object"s. This aids the API client at compile time. The simulation context is created for the entire simulation run group, unlike in Repast where the simulation context exists per simulation run. Adapter developers should first instantiate DistSysRunContext, before instantiating a Simulation-Toolkit-specific Context such as this class.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jorge Calderon
